name: BiggleWorth's Revenge
description:
Journey your way through the cursed house. Pick your play style and attempt to traverse each room of enemies. Oh, and don't forget the final boss!  

Mr. BigglesWorth... What kind of cat are you? I hope for your sake it is a smart one.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Primary Attack: Down Arrow Key
  • Alternate Attack: Left Arrow Key
  • Ultimate Attack: Up Arrow Key

Controller (Xbox):

  • Movement: Left Thumbstick
  • Primary Attack: A 
  • Alternate Attack: X
  • Ultimate Attack: Y

MacDub- Coder

Kei2lee- Music and SFX

FlyingWestie- 3D Character and Enemy Artist

TinyJustice- 3D Environment Artist/ UI Artist

AionMizu- Project Coordinator / Game Designer
